 2024-12912024-12-09GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Peopleâ€™s Republic of China) Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC OF CHINA) REGULATIONS in order to add eight (8) individuals to the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0253 Publication Date: 2024-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC OF CHINA) REGULATIONS in order to add eight (8) individuals to the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
